name: SoundofMajesty
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: sound of majesty
des: Sound of Majesty provides a 24/7, ad-free stream of beautiful sacred and classical music. Listen around the clock to some of your favorite hymns, choral anthems, and a wide assortment of other classical music. On alternating hours, you’ll hear the original Sound of Majesty broadcasts with Greg Wheatley.
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
